content.question: Through the eight and the ninth century C.E., the Kufic calligraphic script that was used in this folio from an early Qur'an was also

choices.label: inscribed on ceramics, metalwork, and architectural features
chiseled into basalt steles pronouncing societal laws
associated with the illuminated manuscript Shahnama
employed solely for recording prayers and incantations

content.answer: inscribed on ceramics, metalwork, and architectural features

unit.text: 7: West and Central Asia, 500 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 7.3: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in West and Central Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
